1.0.0.en: Added support for ZigBee and Z-Wave devices.

1.0.2.en: Added state report for ZigBee device, bug fixes and improvements.

1.0.3.en: Added state report for ZigBee device, bug fixes and improvements.

1.0.4.en: Added measure power, meter power for ZG9100A_S.

1.0.8.en: Add meter power, measure power for ZG9040A_S.

1.0.9.en: Add support for ZV2835RAC-S, change the Zwave device to insecure.

1.0.10.en: Fixes an issue that some Z-Wave devices pairing failed.

1.0.12.en: The ZV9020A can be added now.

1.0.14.en: Add support for tint Smart Switch.

1.0.15.en: Fix an issue that when you switch the lights with the switch button the status in Homey stays.

1.0.17.en: Add external switch type settings for ZG9101SAC_HP.

1.0.20.en: Added support for the new ZV Switches.
